quotes.quote: What has a man's face to do with his character? Can a man of good character help having a disagreeable face?
quotes.author: Ann Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Think of all the beauty still left around you and be happy.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Like anyone else, there are days I feel beautiful and days I don't, and when I don't, I do something about it.
quotes.author: Cheryl Tiegs

quotes.quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: The words that enlighten the soul are more precious than jewels.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Develop interest in life as you see it; in people, things, literature, music - the world is so rich, simply throbbing with rich treasures, beautiful souls and interesting people. Forget yourself.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: I'm tired of all this nonsense about beauty being only skin-deep. That's deep enough. What do you want, an adorable pancreas?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: The first question I ask myself when something doesn't seem to be beautiful is why do I think it's not beautiful. And very shortly you discover that there is no reason.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: I never saw an ugly thing in my life: for let the form of an object be what it may - light, shade, and perspective will always make it beautiful.
quotes.author: John Constable

quotes.quote: I look foreword to an America which will not be afraid of grace and beauty.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Beauty and seduction is nature's tool for survival, because we will protect what we love.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius Antoninus

quotes.quote: Whatever is in any way beautiful hath its source of beauty in itself, and is complete in itself; praise forms no part of it. So it is none the worse nor the better for being praised.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: Just because you are blind, and unable to see my beauty doesn't mean it does not exist.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: Thankfully, beauty is easier to remove than apply, and a swipe of demaquillage in the right direction and you are you once again.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: Ugly. Is irrelevant. It is an immeasurable insult to a woman, and then supposedly the worst crime you can commit as a woman. But ugly, as beautiful, is an illusion.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: Order is the shape upon which beauty depends.
quotes.author: Petrarch

quotes.quote: Rarely do great beauty and great virtue dwell together.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: When I'm working on a problem, I never think about beauty. I think only how to solve the problem. But when I have finished, if the solution is not beautiful, I know it is wrong.
quotes.author: Reverend Sean Parker Dennison

quotes.quote: The ability to see beauty is the beginning of our moral sensibility. What we believe is beautiful we will not wantonly destroy.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: Yes, I was fat, but I dealt with it by simply never thinking about it. It is useful, when you are fat, to have a lot of other things to think about.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: People often say that 'beauty is in the eye of the beholder,' and I say that the most liberating thing about beauty is realizing that you are the beholder. This empowers us to find beauty in places where others have not dared to look, including inside ourselves.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful.
quotes.author: Teena Booth

quotes.quote: There is no excellent beauty that hath not some strangeness in the proportion.
There's something almost perfect in the ugly duckling syndrome. Because a sensitivity is tattooed on a part of you no one else can see but can somehow guess is there.
Eye contact is the best accessory.
If there is one thing worse than being an ugly duckling in a house of swans, it's having the swans pretend there's no difference.
